title: Implement automated story enhancement validation
description: Create an automated system that validates user stories against INVEST criteria and provides real-time enhancement suggestions to improve story quality
iWant: automated validation and enhancement suggestions for user stories
soThat: I can ensure all stories meet quality standards before development begins
acceptanceCriteria: System validates stories against INVEST criteria automatically
Real-time feedback appears as user types story content
Enhancement suggestions are provided for incomplete stories
Validation results are saved with story metadata
Stories cannot be marked Ready until validation passes
